backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/components/BrainDumpView.ts: Transforms draft text into categorized brain-dump items with editing, selection, and backlog export.
frontend/src/components/TaskEnergyAssist: Interactive assistant that classifies task energy and provides suggestions via chat-style UI.
frontend/src/FocusExecutionApp.jsx: Main React app handling energy selection, tasks, timer, stats, and Brain Dump with local storage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling identity load, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, warm theme variables, typography, and custom animations.
frontend/src/lib/taskEnergyClassifier.ts: Implements a local keyword-based classifier that assigns an energy category to a task with confidence and explanation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH theme colors, shadows, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, architecture, features, and requirements for a React-based task management system.
